scripts.clean:node_modules: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const sleep=ms=>new Promise(r=>setTimeout(r,ms));const rmWithRetry=async(p,retries=3)=>{for(let i=0;i<retries;i++){try{fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true});break;}catch(e){if(i===retries-1)throw e;console.log('Retrying...');await sleep(1000);}}};const cwd=process.cwd();const rm=async p=>{if(fs.existsSync(p))await rmWithRetry(p);};const rmMain=async()=>{await rm(path.join(cwd,'node_modules'));const pkgs=path.join(cwd,'packages');if(fs.existsSync(pkgs)){fs.readdirSync(pkgs).forEach(async d=>{await rm(path.join(pkgs,d,'node_modules'));});}};rmMain();"
scripts.clean:stop: node -e "const{execSync,spawnSync}=require('child_process');const pid=process.pid;try{if(process.platform==='win32'){spawnSync('powershell',['-Command',`Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Where-Object {$$_.Id -ne ${pid}} | Stop-Process -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue`],{stdio:'ignore'});}else{execSync(`pkill -f node --ignore ${pid}`,{stdio:'ignore'});}}catch(e){}"
